title: Budai Heshang Yun Youji Zhi Kanghong Fengyun
title_japanese: 布袋和尚云游记之抗洪风云
synopsis: During the period of the Five Dynasties, Mingzhou (now Ningbo, Zhejiang) came out of this monk from Changting Village in the north of Fenghua City, Mingzhou (now Ningbo, Zhejiang). He possessed stunts and was willing to do good things. One year, Budai monk wandered around Fenghua, and it happened to be flooded there. At this time, there was news that the court's disaster relief silver was robbed. During the period, Budai monk got acquainted with all kinds of partners, such as the scholar who loves to fight and hug, the eccentric little orphan, and the self-sacrificing beggar. In order to save the victims in dire straits, Budai monk, with the assistance of scholars, young orphans, and others, revealed the truth behind the looting of the disaster, brought corrupt officials and profiteers to justice, and helped the victims fight the flood and save themselves. (translated from iqiyi)
